name: Get Your Scrap Together
description:
Take control of a robot girl who has been rejected by her own manufacturers. Thankfully, her AI is fully developed and she's able to take parts from other dumped robots. Use this to your advantage and help her escape!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: move
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Drop left module
  • C: Drop right module

Team Members: 

Anter - Programming, Game Design 

Tuinteeru - Character Design/Art, Sprite Artist 

Franopx - Sprite/Assets Artist, Programming 

Ludofonía - Music/SFX, Level Design

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021
